# Affliction (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]] 

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]], [[Wrath (Domain)|Wrath 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Evil creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 90

The subject contracts an affliction selected from the list below, which strikes immediately (no incubation period). Afflictions deal damage only to evil creatures. Any evil creature takes damage equal to that listed plus its Charisma bonus. An evil elemental or evil undead takes an extra 1 point of damage, and an evil outsider or an evil cleric of an evil deity takes an extra 2 points. The DC listed is for the subsequent saves (use afflictionâ€™s normal save DC for the initial saving throw).


| **Affliction** | **DC** | **Damage** |
|---|---|---|
| Depraved decadence | 18 | 1d4 Str |
| Eternal torpor | 14 | 1d6 Dex |
| Raging desire | 15 | 1d3 Con |
| Consuming passion | 17 | 1d4 Int |
| Haunting conscience | 16 | 1d4 Wis |
| Pride in vain | 20 | Cha |
